info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 18 at 6:32PM MST until July 18 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... North Central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... South Central Graham County in southeastern Arizona...
* Until 730 PM MST.
* At 632 PM MST, an area of blowing dust was located over Safford Regional Airport, moving north at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Safford, Willcox, Thatcher, Solomon, San Jose, Bowie, Roper Lake State Park, Safford Regional Airport, Pima, Cochise, Central, Fort Thomas, Swift Trail Junction, Frye Mesa Dam, Mount Graham, Fort Grant and Bonita.
This includes the following highways... Route 191 between mile markers 60 and 134. Route 70 between mile markers 302 and 352. Route 266 between mile markers 105 and 126. Interstate 10 between mile markers 332 and 365. Route 186 between mile markers 327 and 337.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:30 PM MST. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:30 PM MST. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:30 PM MST. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:30 PM MST. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
